content.title: Antayoshti Sahayata Yojana
content.department: Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development
content.details: 'Antayoshti Sahayata Yojana' is a scheme by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand. This is a 100% State Sponsored Scheme. Only the residents/domicile of the state of Jharkhand can apply to this scheme. Applications for this scheme are accepted online through the official website of the department. The scheme provides ₹ 10,000/- for the last rites in the case of the death of the registered beneficiary.
benefits: The scheme provides ₹ 10,000/- for the last rites in the case of the death of the registered beneficiary.
eligibility: The deceased should have been a domicile in the state of Jharkhand.
The deceased should have been a worker registered with the 'Jharkhand Building and Other Construction Worker Welfare Board (JBOCWW Board)'.
The deceased should have been between 18-60 years of age.
The deceased should have been engaged in construction work such as masons, carpenters, electricians, porters, painters, etc.
documents_required: Proof of Registration as a Construction Worker
Document establishing the relationship between the deceased and the applicant

faqs.question: Which Department Manages This Scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is managed by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development, Govt. of Jharkhand.

faqs.question: Is This Scheme State Sponsored Or Centrally Sponsored?
faqs.answer: This scheme is a 100% State Sponsored Scheme.

faqs.question: Where Can I Find The Link To The Scheme Guidelines?
faqs.answer: The Scheme Guidelines can be found at this link - https://shramadhan.jharkhand.gov.in/schemmeDetailsShow.action

faqs.question: Can Women Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is open to applicants from all genders.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accept Offline Applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts online applications.

faqs.question: What Is The URL Of The Website Of Comprehensive Labour Management System For Factory Establishment/Worker Registration/Inspection/Management & Grievance Redressal?
faqs.answer: The URL of the website of Comprehensive Labour Management System for Factory Establishment / Worker Registration / Inspection / Management & Grievance Redressal is https://shramadhan.jharkhand.gov.in/home.

faqs.question: Is There Any Application Fee?
faqs.answer: No. The entire application process is completely free of cost.

faqs.question: How Do I Track The Status Of My Application?
faqs.answer: To track the status of your application, follow the stepwise process given below: Step 1: Once submitted, the application goes for 3-level approval: Clerk > Labour Superintendent > DLC. Step 2: Go to Services > BOC Scheme Benefit > Application Status.
